name: Nevilleton's World of Spooks
description:
"Nevilleton's World of Spooks is a 2.5D roguelike dungeon crawler with horror and puzzle elements. The player scampers through weird, frightening areas and finds a way to escape from being stuck in a madman's world."

Controls:

WASD - Movement
Scroll Wheel - Rotate camera
Spacebar - Interact
Left click - Attack
R - View notes
Esc - Quit

A game created by Little Boy Games for their Thesis project:

Arwyn Silva - Programmer
John David Mempin - Puzzle Programmer
Marty Sy - Character & Environment Artist, Puzzle Programmer
Jennifer Young - UI Artist
Kent Anthony Bartolo - UI Artist
